snippet.title: Astromeda Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
ASTROMEDA is an RPG game with a unique battle system that combines turn-based combat with fast-paced Metroidvania-like attacks! It's inspired by Undertale, Deltarune, Hollow Knight, Celeste, and more modern indies! 

➽ Full Demo! : https://liran-kamisa.itch.io/astromeda-kickstarter-demo
➽ Astromeda Kickstarter pre-launch page! : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/astromeda/astromeda-story-driven-rpg

Follow the game's socials and join the Discord! 👍 
➽ Twitter: https://twitter.com/astromeda_game
➽ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HwyB6XM

Music Composed By Eric E. Hache
Sound Effects by Mathew Valente
Astromeda by Liran Kamisa

For any inquiries: astromedagame@gmail.com

#Astromeda #rpg
